sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RAKE is a well known inſtrument with teeth, by which the ground is divided. See Agriculture, j>. 3 i 8.

p.hi: Rake alſo means a looſe, diſorderly, vicious, and thoughtleſs fellow.

div.p: RAKe oſ a Ship, is all that part of her hull which hangs over both ends of her keel. That which is be-fore is called the fore rake, or rake forward, and that part which is at tlie ſetting on of the ſtern-poſt is call-cd the rake-aji, or afterward.
